title: GavickPro GK Event Manager (Joomla 2.5 and 3.x)
description:
Easy-to-use Joomla template for events or conference website

Powerful, well-designed yet lightweight, the Events template offers a rounded package that makes it easy to advertise your event, whether itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a lengthy training program, simple business meeting, massive music festival or quiet personal gathering.

The frontpage is full of useful sections to generate interest and provide your potential attendees with all they need, with dynamic schedule information from our News Show Pro and Tabs modules and speakers, venue, FAQ and other sections for an informative, easy to read homepage that encourages visitors to sign-up.

3 different ways to list events

Instead of using complex, expensive event-management extensions, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve modified the base K2 functionality to include all relevant information for easy event creation, as well as special custom pages that let you go in-depth with the event agenda, with a choice of listing styles; display your schedule in a simple image list with event info, or provide a view of the full schedule across multiple days for improved clarity.

Sell tickets online with Eventbrite

Need to sell tickets? We support the efficient, flexible Eventbrite system in this template; just head over to their website and sign-up for quick and easy event creation and ticket sales, with ticket previews, countdowns and more all easily added into articles or custom HTML modules using their prepared code.

Smooth CSS animations provide a sleek, professional shine to proceedings, with an impressive animated menu for news and schedule pages, and additional elements like parallax backgrounds, social media links and custom typography completes the package to help you create an amazing event or conference website thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sure to bring in the crowds!
